name: stock_v2_get_financials
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches financial data for a given stock based on performance ID, report type, and interval.

performanceid.description: Value of the performanceId field obtained from endpoints like /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.

reporttype.description: Type of report to retrieve. 'R' for Restated, 'A' for As originally reported. Defaults to 'A'.

interval.description: Interval for the financial data. Choices are 'quarterly' or 'annual'. Defaults to 'annual'.
